mapper.select: select count(*) from TBL_PRODUCT where USE_YN = 'Y'

select PRODUCT_NO , C.NM as "CLASSIFICATION_NO" , PRODUCT_NAME , COST , SAIL_PRICE , PROFIT_MARGIN , RECOMMENDED_CATEGORY , EXPIRATION_PERIOD , PRODUCT_IMG , e.EMP_NAME as "create" , p.CREATE_DATE , e.EMP_NAME as "MODIFIER" , p.MODIFY_DATE , p.DELIVERY_DATE , p.USE_YN from TBL_PRODUCT p join TBL_EMPLOYEE e on (p.CREATER = e.EMP_NO) join TBL_COMMON_CODE c on(SUBSTR(c.CD, -1) = CLASSIFICATION_NO) where p.USE_YN = 'Y' AND c.CD LIKE 'PC00%' order by PRODUCT_NO desc

select PRODUCT_NO , C.NM as "CLASSIFICATION_NO" , PRODUCT_NAME , COST , SAIL_PRICE , PROFIT_MARGIN , RECOMMENDED_CATEGORY , TO_CHAR(EXPIRATION_PERIOD,'YY-MM-DD') as "EXPIRATION_PERIOD" , PRODUCT_IMG , e.EMP_NAME as "create" , p.CREATE_DATE , e.EMP_NAME as "MODIFIER" , p.MODIFY_DATE , p.DELIVERY_DATE , p.USE_YN from TBL_PRODUCT p join TBL_EMPLOYEE e on (p.CREATER = e.EMP_NO) join TBL_COMMON_CODE c on(SUBSTR(c.CD, -1) = CLASSIFICATION_NO) where p.USE_YN = 'Y' AND c.CD LIKE 'PC00%' and product_no = #{prono}
select CD , NM , CREATER , "MODIFY" , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE from TBL_COMMON_CODE where CD LIKE 'PC00%'
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO , CLASSIFICATION_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , COST , SAIL_PRICE , PROFIT_MARGIN , RECOMMENDED_CATEGORY , EXPIRATION_PERIOD , PRODUCT_IMG , CREATER , CREATE_DATE , MODIFIER , MODIFY_DATE , DELIVERY_DATE , USE_YN ) values ( PRODUCT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{productDivision} , #{productName} , #{cost} , #{sailPrice} , #{profitMargin} , 'Y' , TO_DATE(#{expirationPeriod}, 'YY-MM-DD') , #{productImg} , '1010' , sysdate , '1010' , sysdate , #{deliveryDate} , #{useYn} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from TBL_PRODUCT where USE_YN = 'Y' and PRODUCT_NAME like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

select PRODUCT_NO , C.NM as "CLASSIFICATION_NO" , PRODUCT_NAME , COST , SAIL_PRICE , PROFIT_MARGIN , RECOMMENDED_CATEGORY , EXPIRATION_PERIOD , PRODUCT_IMG , e.EMP_NAME as "create" , p.CREATE_DATE , e.EMP_NAME as "MODIFIER" , p.MODIFY_DATE , p.DELIVERY_DATE , p.USE_YN from TBL_PRODUCT p join TBL_EMPLOYEE e on (p.CREATER = e.EMP_NO) join TBL_COMMON_CODE c on(SUBSTR(c.CD, -1) = CLASSIFICATION_NO) where p.USE_YN = 'Y' AND c.CD LIKE 'PC00%' AND PRODUCT_NAME like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by PRODUCT_NO desc
